juzs.text: Kare wa itta. `Sore de, anata gata no o yōken wa nandesuka, shito no kata gata yo
Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni tsukawasa reta nodesu
Doro no tsubute o (ame no yō ni) kare-ra no ue ni furasu tame ni
Hō rachi o tsukusu mono ni taishite,-nushi no omoto de shirusa reta (doro no tsubute o furasou).' To itta
Sore kara, ware wa soko ni ita shinja-tachi o tachi noka seyou to shita
Shikashi, sono (machi no)-chū de miidashita musurimu no ie wa, tada no ikken dakedeatta
Ware wa itamashī chōbatsu o, osoreru mono no tame ni hitotsu no shirushi to shite soko ni nokoshita
Mata mūsā ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga akirakana ken'i o sazukete, kare o firuaun ni tsukawashita toki o omoiokose
Kare (firuaun) wa sono kensei o kasa ni, se o muke,`koitsu wa majutsu-shi ka, soretomo kichigaida.' To itta
Sorede are wa, kare to sono gunzei o toraete umi ni nagekonda. Hontōni kare wa, ke shikaranu monodeatta
Mata ādo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga sangai o motarasu kaze o kare-ra ni okutta toki o omoiokose
Sore wa kare-ra o osotte, subete o kaimetsu shi haikyo no yō ni shite, nani mo nokosanakatta
Mata samūdo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). `Tsukanoma (no anata gata no nama) o tanoshime.' To iwa reta toki o omoiokoshi nasai
Sonotoki kare-ra wa,-nushi no meirei ni ōhei ni somuitanode, are yo to mite iru ma ni kaminari ni osowa reta
Mohaya kare-ra wa oki noboru koto mo dekizu, mata mamoru koto mo dekinakatta
Izen ni mo, nūfu no min o (ware wa horoboshita). Hontōni kare-ra wa hangyaku no mindeatta
Ware wa iryoku o motte ten o uchi-date, hate shinai hirogari ni shita
Mata ware wa daichi o uchi hirogeta. Nanto migoto ni hirogeta koto yo
Mata ware wa, subete no mono o ryōsei ni tsukutta. Anata gata wa kunkai o ukeirerudearou (to iu hairyo kara)
Sorede anata gata wa, arrā no higo no shita ni omomuke. Hontōni watashi wa kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu
Sore de arrā to issho ni soto no kami o tatete wa naranai. Hontōni watashi wa, kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu
Dōyō ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, shito ga kare-ra ni yattekuru tabi ni,`majutsu-shi ka, matawa kichigaida.' To itta
Kare-ra wa sore o ikun to shite keishō shite kita no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa hōgai no mindearu
Sore de, kare-ra o sakete sare. Anata gata wa (kare-ra no okonai ni taishite) togame wa nai nodearu
Daga kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa shinja-tachi o ekisuru
Jin to ningen o tsukutta no wa ware ni tsukae saseru tame
Ware wa kare-ra ni don'na kate mo motomezu, mata fuyō sa reru koto mo motomenai
Hontōni arrā koso wa, kate o sadzuke rareru okata, kengonaru iryoku no omode ara reru
Akugyō no to no sazukari-bun (batsu) wa, kare-ra no nakama no sazukari-bun (batsu) to onajidearou.Dakara sō (ware o) sekitatenakute mo ī
Shinkō shinai mono ni wazawai are. Yakusoku no hi ga kare-ra ni kanarazu yattekuru
Kano (keiji no) yama ni kakete (chikau)
Seizento kakishirusa reta Keisuke ni kakete
maka rete inai yōhishi ni
fudan ni mōde rareru seiden ni kakete
takaku kakage rareta tengai ni kakete
minagiri afureru taiyō ni kakete (chikau)
Hontōni omo no chōbatsu wa kanarazu kudaru
Sore wa sake enai
Sonohi, ten wa ōini yurayura to yure
mata yamayama wa yurugi ugokudearou
Sonohi,(shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono ni wazawai are
Munashī koto ni tawamurete ita-sha-tachi ni
Kare-ra ga (monosugoi chikara de) jigoku no hi no naka ni tsuki otosa reru sonohi
(kō iwa reyou. ) `Kore koso wa, anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita jigoku no gōkadearu
Kore demo majutsuna no ka. Soretomo anata gata wa, mienai no ka
Anata gata wa soko de yaka reruga ī. Anata gataga sore o taeshinon demo, shinobanakute mo onaji koto. Anata gataga okonatta koto ni, mukui rareru dakedearu
Nushi o osoreta-sha-tachi wa kanarazu rakuen no yorokobi no naka ni 置Ri
nushi ga kare-ra ni ataeru mono ni kanki shi, mata omo ga goku hi no chōbatsu kara kare-ra o sukuwa reta koto o yorokobu
(Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Tanoshinde tabe, katsu nome. Kore mo anata gata no (yoi) okonai no tamedearu
Kare-ra wa narabe rareta sofā ni yorikakari, ware wa utsukushī-me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigūsha ni surudearou

Shinkō suru mono-tachi, mata kare-ra ni shitagatta shinjinbukai shison no mono-tachi, ware wa, sorera no mono o (rakuen ni oite) isshonisuru. Kare-ra no subete no kōi ni taishi, sukoshi mo (hōshō o) keigen shinaidearou. Daremoga sono kasegi ni taishi, hōshū o ukeru
Mata ware wa kudamono, niku, sono soto kare-ra no nozomu mono o ataeyou
Kare-ra wa soko de tagaini hai o kawasou. Sono tokini mo munashī hanashi ni fukeru koto naku, ranbō mo okasanai
Kare-ra no shū ni wa, hime rareta shinju no yōna kodomo ga kashizuite meguru
Kare-ra wa tagaini chikayotte, tazune ai
itte ita. `Izen, watashi-tachi wa kazoku no ma ni ite mo itsumo ki o nokotte ita
Daga arrā wa, watashi-tachi ni onmegumi o atae rare, neppū no chōbatsu kara o sukui kudasa reta
Izen kara watashi-tachi wa, kare ni inotte ita nodesu. Hontōni kare wa megumi atsuku, jihibukaki okata de ara reru
sā, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai
Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Matte iruga ī. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou
Ittai kare-ra no mazushī rikai-ryoku ga kō meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hōgaina min'na no ka
Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu
Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi
Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sōzō-shana no ka
Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sōzō shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinkō ga nai nodearu
Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka
Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shōko o motte kitasa seruga yoi
Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka
Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka
Soretomo yūgen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka
Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubō ni kakarudearou
Soretomo kare-ra wa, arrā igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arrā ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru
Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni kontō suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke
Sonohi kare-ra no sakubō wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou
Hontōni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chōbatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa kidzukanai
Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontōni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai
Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai
Shizumi yuku hoshi ni kakete (chikau)
Anata gata no dōryō wa, mayotte iru node wa naku, mata machigatte iru node mo nai
Mata (jibun no) nozomu koto o itte iru node mo nai
Sore wa kare ni keiji sa reta, o tsuge nihokanaranai
Narabinai iryoku no mochinushi ga, kare ni oshieta no wa
sugureta chiryoku no mochinushidearu. Massugu ni tatte
kare wa chihei no mottomo takai tokoro ni arawareta
Sore kara orite kite, chikadzuita
Oyoso yumi 2tsu, iya sore yori mo chikai kyorideatta ka
Soshite shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kare no keiji o tsugeta
Kokoro wa jibun ga mita koto o itsuwaranai
Kare no mita koto ni tsuite, anata gata wa kare to ronsō suru no ka
Hontōni kare (muhanmado) wa, saido no kōka ni oite mo, kare (jiburīru) o mita nodearu
(Dare mo kosenai) 涯 Ni aru, su~idora ki no hata de
Sono soba ni tsui no sumai no rakuen ga aru
Ōu mono ga su~idora ki o konmori to ōu toki
(Kare no) shisen wa suiyose rare, mata (bushitsuke ni)-do o sugosu koto mo nai
Kare wa tashika ni,-nushi no ō no shirushi o mita nodearu
Anata gata wa, arrāto to uzzā o (nanidearu to) kangaeru ka
Sore kara dai 3-banme no manāto o
Anata gata ni wa danshi ga ari, kare ni wa joshi ga aru to iu no ka
Soredewa, hontōni futōna wakekatadearou

Sorera wa, anata gata ya sosen-tachi ga nadzuketa (tada no) namae ni suginai. Arrā wa (don'na) ken'i o mo, sorera ni kudasa renakatta. Kare-ra (fushinjin-sha) wa, munashī okusoku ya shiyoku ni shitagatte iru nisuginai. Sudeni omo kara no michibiki ga, kare-ra ni kite irunoni
Oyoso ningen ni wa, hoshīmono wa nani demo te ni hairu no ka
Iya, raise mo gense mo, arrā no yūdearu
Ten ni ikaga ni tenshi ga ite mo, arrā ga nozoma re, sono o yorokobi ni azukaru mono ni taisuru o yurushi ga deta nochidenakereba, kare-ra (tenshi) no torinashi wa nani no yaku ni mo tatanai
Hontōni raise o shinjinai mono wa, tenshi ni josei no na o tsuke tari suru
Kare-ra wa (nani no) chishiki mo naku, okusoku ni shitagau dakedearu. Daga shinri ni taishite wa, okusoku nado nani mo yakudatsu wake wanai
Sorede anata wa ware no kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha, mata konoyo no seikatsu shika nozomanai mono kara tōzakare

Kono teido (gense no seikatsu) ga, kare-ra no chishiki no todoku genkaidearu. Hontōni omo wa,-dō kara mayotte iru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Mata kare wa, michibiki o ukeru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
Hontōni ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arrā no yūdearu. Dakara akugyō no itazurani wa fusawashī mukui o atae rare, mata zenkō no itazurani wa saizen no mono de mukuwa reru

Chīsai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina kōi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yōsha wa hontōni kōdaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijō butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru
Anata wa (shinri kara) somuki saru mono o mita ka
Wazuka ni hodokoshi o shite wa,(-mono ka mi shite) tomeru
Sōiu mono ni yūgen-kai no chishiki ga atte, sorede nani demo mieru to iu no ka
Soretomo, mūsā no sho ni aru koto ga, tsuge rareta koto wa nai no ka
Mata (yakusoku o) kanzen ni hatashita iburāhīmu no koto mo
Omoni o ou mono wa, tanin no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai
Ningen wa, sono doryoku shita mono igai, nani mo eru koto wa dekinai
Sono doryoku (no seika) wa, yagate mitomerarerudearou
Yagate hōshō wa, jūbun ni mukui rareru
Hontōni anata no omoni koso, kichaku-sho wa aru
Kare koso wa, warawase nakaseru okata
Mata shina se, ikasu okatadearu
Hontōni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta
Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de
Mata 2-dome no sōzō (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu
Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata
Mata ōkami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata
Kare wa mukashi ādo (no min) o horoboshi
Mata samūdo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta
Sore izen ni nūfu no min mo. Hontōni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta
Mata (sodomutogomora no yō ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi
Soshite kare wa sore o ōi sara reta
(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka
Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu
(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru
Sore wa arrā no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai
Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka
Chōshō wa shite mo, nakanai no ka
Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka
Ichizu ni arrā ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai
Toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa
Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satte,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubō ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru
Kore made, samazamana shōsoku wa, sudeni motarasa re, sorede jūbun jisei dekita hazu
Sore wa mezamashī eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta
Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tōzakare. Shōshū-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi
Kare-ra wa me o fusete, chōdo batta ga chirabaru yō ni hakaba kara dete kite
shōshū-sha no kata ni isogu. Fushinjin-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa dainan no hidesu
Kare-ra izen ni, nūfu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuihō shita
Sore de kare wa omoni,`watashi wa, hontōni chikaratsukimashita. Dō ka o tasuke kudasai.' To inotta
Sorede ware wa, ten no sho mon o hiraki mizu o sosogi fura seta
Mata daichi ni moroizumi o funshutsu sa se, mizu wa awasari, kanete no kami inochi ni yoru koto (kōzui) ga okita
Shikashi ware wa ita to kugi de tsukutta mono (hakobune) ni kare o nosete yatta
Waga mimamoru naka de sore wa hashitta. Kore ga (mina kara) shirizoke rareta ano mono e no mukuidearu
Ware wa kore o hitotsu no shirushi to shite nokoshita. Sate dare ka satoru mono wa aru ka
Sā waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka
Hontōni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Ādo (no min) mo (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita. Sorede waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka
Ware wa saiyaku no uchitsudzuku hi ni, kare-ra ni taishi arekuruu kaze o okutta
Suruto ningen wa, nekosogi ni natta. Natsumeyashi no kirikabu no yō ni, mushiri sara reta
Ano toki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka
Makotoni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku tokiakashita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Samūdo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita
Soshite kare-ra wa itta. `Nani to, watashi-tachi no naka no ikkai no ningende wanaidesu ka. Dōshite kon'na mono ni shitagaimasu ka. Sore koso jadō, kichigaizatadesu
Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ōuso-tsukidesu
(Ōse rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o
Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore
Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yō tsutae nasai
Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta
Sonotoki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to ga dōdeatta ka
Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yō ni natta
Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Rūto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita
Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Rūto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui
ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yō ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru
(Rūto wa) waga chōbatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita
Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sā, waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae
Akuru asa, eien no chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta
Sā waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae
Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Hontōni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta
(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyōryokuna mono no 一摑 Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta
Anata gata fushinjin-sha (kuraishu-zoku) no kata ga, korera no mono yori mo sugurete iru no ka. Soretomo Keisuke no naka ni anata gata no tame no shamen ga aru no ka
Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shōri o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka
Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou
Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashī mottomo kurushī me ni audearou
Hontōni korera no tsumi o okashite iru-sha-tachi wa, meimō to chōbatsu no uchi ni aru
Hi no naka ni kao o shita ni shite hikizura reru sonohi, kare-ra wa,`mōka no fure guai o ajiwai nasai.'(To iwa reyou)
Hontōni ware wa subete no jibutsu o, kichinto hakatte sōzō shita
Mata waga meirei wa tada hitokoto, Shun no yōna monodearu
Ware wa kore made, anata gata (makka no tashinkyō to) no dōrui o horoboshita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka
Kare-ra no shogyō wa, shosatsu ni subete kiroku sa rete iru
Daishō subete no koto ga, hitoshiku kakitome rarete iru
Hontōni omo o osoreru mono wa,-en to kawa no aru
zen'nō no ōja no omoto no, shinri no za ni (sumu nodearu)
Jihi amaneku okata ga
kono kuruān o oshie rareta
(Kare wa) ningen o tsukuri
monoiu jutsu o oshie rareta
Taiyō to tsuki wa, hitotsu no keisan ni shitagai (unkō shi)
kusa mo ki mo,(jihi amaneku okata ni) sajida suru
Kare wa ten o takaku kakage, hakari o mōke rareta
Anata gataga hakari o fusei ni mochiinai tamedearu
Gensei ni heikō o mune to shi ryōme o sukunaku shite wa naranai
Mata daichi o,-sei aru mono no tame ni mōke rareta
Soko ni kajitsu ga ari,(mi o sasaeru) gaku o kōmuru natsumeyashi
kara ni tsutsuma reru kokumotsu to,(sono soto no) tamamono
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
(Kare wa) tōkō no yō ni doro kara ningen o tsukura re
mata hi no honō kara Jin (kasoke Tadashi) o tsukura reta
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
(Kare wa) 2tsu no azuma no omodeari, mata 2tsu no nishi no omode ara reru
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Kare wa 2tsu no umi o issho ni gōryū sa se rareru
(Daga) ryōsha no ma ni wa,(arrā no hairyo ni yotte) shōheki ga a Ri ichi hō ga tahō o seiatsu suru koto wanai
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Ryōhō wa shinju to sango o san suru
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Yama no yō ni kaijō ni ho o haru fune wa, kare no yūdearu
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Chijō ni aru banbutsu wa shōmetsu suru
Daga (eien ni) kawaranai mono wa, songen to eiyo ni michita anata no omo no jigandearu
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Ten to ji no subete no mono wa, kare ni mukatte koi motomeru. Higoto ni kare wa,(aratana) miwaza de shori nasa reru
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Anata gata (ningen to Jin no) 2tsu no shū yo, ware wa anata gata no tame, imani (Saigonoshinpan de anata gata no shōbatsu ni) torikakarudearou
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka
Jin to ningen no shū yo, moshi anata gataga, tenchi no ryōiki kara tōku ni koe rarerunara, koete mi nasai. Ken'nō ga nakute wa, koeru koto wa dekinai
Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka

Don'na wake de anata gata wa, arrā no michi no tame hodokosanai no ka. Hontōni tenchi no isan no sōzoku wa, arrā ni zokusuru. Anata gata no naka, shōri no mae ni (zai o) hodokoshi sentō suru mono to,-go kara sō suru mono to onajide wanai. Korera no mono wa,(shōri no)-go ni hodokoshite sentō suru mono yori mo kōidearu. Daga arrā wa, subete no mono ni zen (ki hōshō) o yakusoku sa reta. Hontōni arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru

Anata gata wa, ichido shinda daichi o arrā ga yomigaera sa reru koto o shire. Ware wa shuju no shirushi o anata gata no tame ni meiji shita. Osoraku anata gata wa satorudearou
Hodokoshi o suru otoko to hodokoshi o suru on'na to arrā ni yoi kashi o, kashi tsuke suru mono ni wa, kare wa sore o bai ni sa re,(sono soto ni) kimaenoyoi hōshō o sazukerudearou

Arrā to sono shito o shinjiru mono, korera no mono wa (shinri o aisuru) shinjitsuna monodeari,-nushi no o me ni wa jisshō-shadearu. Kare-ra ni wa hōshō to kōmyō ga arou.Daga shinjinai mono mata waga shuju no shirushi o usodearu to iu mono, korera no mono wa, gōka no jūnindearou

Anata gata no gense no seikatsu wa asobi tawamure ni sugizu, mata kyoshoku to, tagai no ma no kojideari, zaisan to shijo no hariai ni suginai koto o shire. (Gense no seikatsu o) tatoereba jiu no yōna mono de,(sakumotsu wa) seichō shite fushinjin-sha (nōfu) o yorokobaseru. Yagate sore wa karete kiiro ni kawari, tsuide konagona ni nari hateru no o anata gata wa mirudearou. Daga raise ni oite wa (fugi no to ni) kibishī chōbatsu ga ari, mata (seigi no itazurani wa) arrā kara kan'yō to zen-shō o sazukarou. Hontōni gense no seikatsu wa, munashī giman no kyōraku ni suginai

Anata gata wa omo kara no kan'yō (o kou tame) ni, aikiso tte doryoku shi nasai. Sore wa tenchi no hiro-sa hodo no kōdaina rakuen de, arrā to shito o shinjiru mono no tame ni junbi sa rete iru. Kore wa arrā no onkei de okokoro ni kanau mono ni sore o sazukeru. Hontōni arrā wa, idaina onkei no omode ara reru

Chijō ni oite okoru wazawai 危 Mo, mata anata gata no minoue ni kudaru mono mo, hitotsu to shite ware ga sore o sazukeru mae ni, shosatsu no naka ni shirusa rete inai mono wanai. Sore wa arrā ni oite wa, yōina gōdearu
Sore wa anata gata ga ushinatta tame ni kanashimazu, atae rareta tame ni, manshin shinai tamedearu. Hontōni arrā wa, unubore no tsuyoi kōman'na mono o o konomi ni nara renai
Kon'na mono wa monooshimidearukara, hitobito ni mo monooshimi o susumeru. Tatoe dareka (omo no michi kara) somuki satte mo, arrā wa motomoto michi tara reru okatadeari, sanbi subeki okatadearu

Jitsuni ware wa meishō o sazukete shito-tachi o tsukawashi, mata kare-ra to issho ni, Keisuke to (seija no) hakari o kudashita. Sore wa hitobito ga seigi o okonau tamedearu. Mata ware wa tetsu o kudashita. Soreni wa idaina chikara ga ari, mata ningen no tame ni shuju no ben'eki o kyōsuru. Sore wa arrā ga, mitsu ni kare o tasukeru mono, mata shito-tachi o tasukeru mono o, shitte ora reru tamedearu. Hontōni arrā wa kyōdai ni shite iryoku narabinaki hō de ara reru

Ware wa, izen, nūfu to iburāhīmu o tsukawashita. Mata ware wa ryōsha no shison ni yogen no tenbun to keiten o sazuketa. Sore de kare-ra no aru mono wa michibika reta. Daga, ōku no mono wa arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta

Sorekara waga shito o, kare-ra no ashiato ni shitagawa se, sarani maruyamu no ko īsā o tsukawashi, fukuin o sazuke, mata kare-ra ni shitagau mono no mune ni hakuai to jihi no jō o mota seta. Daga kin'yoku no shūdōin-sei wa, kare-ra ga jibun de tsukutta mono de, ware ga kare-ra ni sore o shiji shite wa inai. Arrā no yorokobi o etai bakari ni shita kotodaga, kare-ra wa sore mo mamoraneba naranai yō ni wa mamotte inakatta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra no naka no shinkō suru mono ni wa hōshō o ataeta. Daga kare-ra no ōku no mono wa arrā no okite ni somuku-sha-tachideatta

Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, arrā o osore, kare no shito o shinji nasai. Kare wa bai no jihi o sazuke, mata kōmyō o anata gata no tame ni mōke, sorede (tadashī michi o) ayuma se, mata anata gata (no kako no zaigō) o yurusa reru. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru

Arrā no onkei o kare-ra ga sukoshi mo sayū dekinai koto o, mata onkei wa arrā no ote no naka ni aru to iu koto o keiten'notami wa shiru ga ī. Kare no o kokoronikanau-sha wa, sore o sazukaru. Hontōni arrā wa idaina onkei no omodearu
